statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-8 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 2 , -7 \, x^{3} + 18 \, x^{2} - 19 \, x - 18 , -x^{3} - 2 \, x - 4 , 4 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x + 2 , 3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
